name: Prototype Z (v0.0004)
description:
The Game;

In this small top down arena shooter you have to survive as long as you can amongst the ever growing zombie hoard hunting you down in the woods. Kill, vault over logs and eat mushrooms to survive.  Controls are in the top right of the screen + escape to exit whenever.

Dev Notes;

This is just a fun little game I've been working on recently, it's very primitive ATM and ik its just a arcade shooter however that is temporary. (everything is placeholder and subject to change)

Comment below your HIGH-SCORE, mine is 185 on medium. I'm sure you'll beat it no problem :D

Plans for the future include; making it open world, inventory, crafting/building, multiplayer? (if i can do it aha), procedurally generated terrain and loot, more weapons and items, more characters / NPCs and some additional survival mechanics... 

Feel free to add any cool ideas you would like to add for a game like this, course i can't promise anything but if its cool and i am capable enough i shall add it.

Let me know of any bugs. If you experience game breaking bugs try restarting the exe. from my experience of playing i have not experienced any but i am curious to find out what happens on your end.
